PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2015-11002015-07-16,  ,  ,  VAC, 
ActCanadian Forces Members and Veterans Re-establishment and Compensation Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canadian Forces Members and Veterans Re-establishment and Compensation Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADIAN FORCES MEMBERS AND VETERANS RE-ESTABLISHMENT AND COMPENSATION REGULATIONS in order to (1) support the creation and delivery of the Retirement Income Security Benefit, the Critical Injury Benefit and the Family Caregiver Relief Benefit; and (2) provide Canadian Armed Forces members, who receive a decision on eligibility for certain New Veterans Charter benefits and services prior to their release, with a reasonable period of time to apply for a review of that decision.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2015-0197 Publication Date: 2015-07-29
AttachmentsAttachment
